name: 艾娃·琼

last_movies.title: 法律与秩序：特殊受害者 第二十六季

introduction: Ava Jean is an American actor, singer, and dancer who began her professional career in 2018 with A Carolina Snowbelle Christmas at The Kennedy Center. The daughter of a Radio City Rockette, Ava was immersed in dance performance from an early age. Her dance training included studying under Amanda Edge of the New York City Ballet and Brad Parquette of the Joffrey Ballet.She began acting in 2019, training with Zak Barnett and made her on-camera debut at 14 in the pilot Childish. Her most recent credits include an upcoming holiday film All Is Merry and Bright as well as a guest-star on the 26th season of on Law & Order: Special Victims Unit. In 2025, she will portray Savannah in A Week Away, a musical series from Angel Studios.
